establishing.from sentence: We see that our simple LSTM reg model achieves state of the art on Reuters and IMDB ( see , rows 9 and 10 ) , establishing mean scores of 87.0 and 52.8 for F 1 score and accuracy on the test sets of Reuters and IMDB , respectively .

LSTM reg.from sentence: We observe that LSTM reg consistently improves upon the performance of LSTM base across all of the tasks - see rows 9 and 10 , where , on average , regularization yields increases of 1.5 and 0.5 points for F 1 score and accuracy , respectively .

few of our LSTM reg runs.from sentence: A few of our LSTM reg runs attain state - of - theart test F 1 scores on AAPD .

non-neural LR and SVM baselines.from sentence: Interestingly , the non-neural LR and SVM baselines perform remarkably well .

Reuters.from sentence: On Reuters , for example , the SVM beats many neural baselines , including our non-regularized LSTM base ( rows 2 - 9 ) .

SVM.from sentence: On AAPD , the SVM either ties or beats the other models , losing only to SGM ( rows 2 - 8 ) .

LR baseline.from sentence: Compared to the SVM , the LR baseline appears better suited for the single - label datasets IMDB and Yelp 2014 , where it achieves better accuracy than the SVM does .
